Mesh: Mesh to use on the spline
CenterAdjust: Tweak to center the mesh correctly on the spline
ForwardAxis: Chooses the forward axis for the spline mesh orientation
UpAxis: Chooses the up axis for the spline mesh orientation
bCenterH: Whether to automatically center the mesh horizontally on the spline
bScaleToWidth: Whether to scale the mesh to fit the width of the spline
